Sentencas: The solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine (SOFC-GT) hybrid power generation system offers a possible technology of high efficiency combined with low emissions.
Titulo: Study on control strategy for a SOFC-GT hybrid system with anode and cathode recirculation loops

Sentencas: Due to its highly coupled system and complex dynamic characteristics, several vital parameters such as fuel cell temperature, thermal stress, steam-to-carbon, turbine inlet temperature, and compressor surge margin must be controlled and restricted to a feasible zone to guarantee the safe operation of the hybrid system.
Titulo: Study on control strategy for a SOFC-GT hybrid system with anode and cathode recirculation loops

Sentencas: A novel control strategy was carried out for the SOFC-GT hybrid system with anode and cathode recirculation loops.
Titulo: Study on control strategy for a SOFC-GT hybrid system with anode and cathode recirculation loops

Sentencas: In the SOFC thermal management system, two control loops were introduced to keep anode temperature and cathode temperature.
Titulo: Study on control strategy for a SOFC-GT hybrid system with anode and cathode recirculation loops

Sentencas: The behaviors of the control system were compared with the control system without an anode temperature control loop during load following.
Titulo: Study on control strategy for a SOFC-GT hybrid system with anode and cathode recirculation loops

Sentencas: The results reveal that the anode channel temperature and cathode channel temperature should both be controlled to avoid huge temperature differences and temperature gradient in SOFC.
Titulo: Study on control strategy for a SOFC-GT hybrid system with anode and cathode recirculation loops

Sentencas: The designed control system 1 in this study for the hybrid system is feasible and effective.
Titulo: Study on control strategy for a SOFC-GT hybrid system with anode and cathode recirculation loops
